subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Despite a tumultuous week that saw two key components of the Huskies’ backcourt suspended, UConn continued its red-hot run on Saturday, outlasting Big East rival Pittsburgh, 60-53.
snippet: Despite a tumultuous week that saw two key components of the Huskies’ backcourt suspended, UConn continued its red-hot run on Saturday, outlasting Big East rival Pittsburgh, 60-53.
